item.title: Fix the installation block on Ubuntu
item.description: This is a very short post to record me how to fix the installation block on Ubuntu. Accurately say, it’s not Ubunut, it’s lintmint but based on Ubuntu, so the commands are also suit for Ubuntu. When I installed a .deb package and failed (The command: sudo dpkg -i ./<package_name>.deb). Followed the warning message, I use apt install --fix-broken but fixed failed. So I know I needed to delete this software.
